title: Script - Hand lettered, but based on what font?
author: toriertorie

comments.content:
Branding identity of Austin ' [Easy Tiger](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.easytigeraustin.com/)' Bake Shop & Beer by [Caleb Owen Everitt](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.caleboweneveritt.com/) @ [L A N D](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.workbyland.com/#/easy-tiger-bake-shop-and-beer-garden). Previous [discussion](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/typophile.com/node/101417) on this specific topic. Still unsolved and still got only alternatives: ome alternatives: [CAC Lasko](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/?q=lasko), [That's Font Folks](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.dafont.com/thats-font-folks.font), [Prelude](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.dafont.com/preludeflf.font), [Propisi](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/propisi), [Einstein Grand](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.dafont.com/einstein-grand.font), [Showcase Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/latinotype/showcase/script), [Inessa](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/maccampus/inessa), [Spaghettu Western](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/spaghetti-western), [Matinee Idol](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/matinee-idol), [Society Editor](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/society-editor), [Bogie](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/artandsignstudio.com/bogie.html)  
Plus an interesting [discussion](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/typophile.com/node/115042) around this kind of letterings.

You won't find this combination of swirly capitals and plain lower case in a single font. For swirly capitals check out Melany Lane [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/yellow-design/melany-lane/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/yellow-design/melany-lane/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/yellow-design/melany-lane/") or ITC Clover [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/clover-itc/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025201/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/clover-itc/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/clover-itc/")  
Also CAC Lasko by American Greetings Corporation 1996. Don't know of a legitimate source.  
Don
